definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="first">first</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="221" y="25"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="move_entity"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">150</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:first</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">9</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1" else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:first</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> A missile is being launched in the biohazard zone. Be wary!</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:first</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="6"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">A missile is being launched at: </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">, </field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">. </field></block></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">In the bio zone.</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Missile Activated</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
